executionSystem.description: The system id of the execution system where this app should run.

id.description: Unique id of this app. Comprised of the app name-version.

isPublic.description: Whether the application is public or private.

lastModified.description: The date this application was last modified in ISO 8601 format.

name.description: The name of the application. The name does not have to be unique, but the combination of name and version does.

revision.description: The number of times this application has been revised.

shortDescription.description: The short description of this application.

version.description: The version of the application in #.#.# format. While the version does not need to be unique, the combination of name and version does have to be unique.
